description: From Middle English levely, levelike, lefliȝ, leofliche, from Old English lēoflīċe (“kindly, graciously, gladly, lovingly”), from Proto-Germanic *leubalīka, from Proto-Germanic *leubalīkaz, equivalent to lief +‎ -ly.

adverbs.description: liefly (comparative more liefly, superlative most liefly)
